How We Do IT… Engagement Models

While most companies offer many approaches, Daugherty has intentionally designed alternative solutions to help companies to find the right fit for their needs.

Daugherty Advantage

A unique combination of deep industry experience through a local practice model

vs. Technology Providers, Niche and Staffing Firms

• Able to understand the broader business and technical integration issues

• Solution neutral — we aren’t trying to sell a specific tool, technology, hardware, or service

• Able to actually implement through deep, industrial-strength experience

• Able to leverage point skills when, and as needed

• Able to take accountability for results

• Greater capabilities through proven methods, techniques, tools, & pre-built components

• Able to rapidly deliver proven, reliable, results — not just a technical skill set

• Our consultants are long-term employees rewarded on client success


vs. Global and Offshore Consulting Firms

• Greater technical depth

• Able to rapidly respond with proven, reliable results — higher quality and faster speed than offshore firms

• Sustainable cost model—typically 25% to 40% cost savings and limited travel expense due to local delivery model

• More pragmatic results-focus provides more rapid business results

• Continuity and experienced resources

• More flexible in providing services the way the client buys

Daugherty Timeline

Throughout our history, our focus has been on delivering exceptional value to our clients while providing exceptional opportunities for our employees.

timeline.event: Founded in St. Louis as Digital Systems Consultants by Ron & Jan Daugherty
Re-branded as Daugherty Systems with focus on delivering Project Services
Acquired WCS/Microvane distribution software product company
RPM Rapid Process Map, Daugherty proprietary methodology for software development is trademarked
Re-branded as Daugherty Business Solutions to reflect emphasis on delivering strategy, technology and innovation to Fortune 500
Signed first application managed service agreement – still in place today
30 year anniversary with 1000+ employees from Management Consultants to Developers
Customer engagement and Business analytics COE established

columns.body:
Partnerships & Alliances

Deep technology capabilities with a solution neutral, business-driven approach.

Client Testimonials

What our clients say about us

testimonials.quote: “Daugherty runs circles around you guys in the segmentation space.”
testimonials.source: - Executive explaining to competitor why Daugherty won CPG engagement.

testimonials.quote: “Daugherty consultants are light years ahead of who we had been using.  We’ve had people trying to agree on this for three years and in a half day we finally have agreement.”
“They [business users] called us the ‘Ferrari Team’ because they had never seen such fast results. I recommended that another manager use your company.  I told him it would make his life easier.”
testimonials.source: - Project Manager for a major transportation company

testimonials.quote: “…You have raised the expectation bar really high!”
testimonials.source: - IT Manager referring to our custom application development work

testimonials.quote: “I want to thank each of you for your work in designing and implementing the new website…this took a great deal of effort and many long hours. It was a terrific team effort and I appreciate your contribution to making it happen.”
testimonials.source: - CEO and Owner of a regional hotel chain

testimonials.quote: “Congratulations on a flawless implementation! I wish all EDW implementations went as smoothly as this one.  The folks at Daugherty have been a pleasure to work with.”

testimonials.source: - CTO if Communications Company referring to a Daugherty built Operational Data Store.

testimonials.quote: “I found the Daugherty consultants to be highly skilled experts who stayed focused on the bottom line and who blended well with my team. Bottom line, I would recommend Daugherty without any reservations.”
testimonials.source: - Former financial executive for telecommunications company

testimonials.quote: “We want to congratulate the (Daugherty) team that successfully launched the new system. We usually don’t like consultants, but we like you guys. You work well with our people.”

“Just wanted you to know how much I appreciate your team’s contribution and the professionalism they have demonstrated throughout this project. I have been particularly impressed with the oversight and governance.”
testimonials.source: - Director of IT, Store Operations for major home improvement retailer
